title: Pretty Fly
lyrics:
[intro] Gunter glieben glauten globen
[clap XX-X] Give it to me, baby! (Uh huh, uh huh!)  x3
[stop] And all the girlies say, I'm pretty fly for a white guy
(Am)  (Em-G)  (Am)  (D-C)  x3 
(Am)Uno, dos, (Em)tres, cuatro, (Am)cinco, cinco, (D)seis
You (Am)know it's kind of hard, just to get along today
Our (Am)subject isn't cool, but he fakes it anyway
He (Am)may not have a clue, and he may not have style
But (Am)everything he lacks, well he makes up in denial
 
[chorus]
So (Am)don't debate (Em)
A (Am)player straight (Em)
(C)You know he (G)really doesn't (D)GET IT ANYWAY
He's gonna (Am)play the field (Em)
And (Am)keep it real (Em)
For (C)you no (G)way, for (D)you no way
So if (Am)you don't rate (Em)
Just over(Am)compensate (Em)
At least (C)you'll know (G)you can always (D)go on Ricki Lake
(F) The world needs (G)wannabe's
So (Am)hey, hey do that brand new (Am-stop)thing!
 
(Am)Give it to me (Em)baby ((Am) Ah-ha, (D) Ah-ha!)  x3
And (Am)all the girls (Em)say I'm pretty (Am)fly (for a (D)white guy)
 
[straight in]
He (Am)needs some cool tunes, not just any will suffice
But they (Am)didn't have Ice Cube, so he bought Vanilla Ice
Now (Am)cruising in his Pinto, he sees homies as he pass
But (Am)if he looks twice, they're gonna kick his lily ass!
 
[chorus]
So (Am)don't debate (Em)
A (Am)player straight (Em)
(C)You know he (G)really doesn't (D)GET IT ANYWAY
He's gonna (Am)play the field (Em)
And (Am)keep it real (Em)
For (C)you no (G)way, for (D)you no way
So if (Am)you don't rate (Em)
Just over(Am)compensate (Em)
At least (C)you'll know (G)you can always (D)go on Ricki Lake
(F) The world needs (G)wannabe's
So (Am)hey, hey do that brand new (Am-stop)thing!
 
[clap XX-X]
Now he's getting a tattoo, yeah he's gettin' ink done
He asked for a '13', but they drew a '31'
Friends say he's trying too hard, and he's not quite hip
But in his own mind, he's the dopest trip!
 
(Am)Give it to me (Em)baby ((Am) Ah-ha, (D) Ah-ha!)  x3
And (Am)all the girls (Em)say I'm pretty (Am)fly (for a (D)white guy)
 
[chorus]
So (Am)don't debate (Em)
A (Am)player straight (Em)
(C)You know he (G)really doesn't (D)GET IT ANYWAY
He's gonna (Am)play the field (Em)
And (Am)keep it real (Em)
For (C)you no (G)way, for (D)you no way
So if (Am)you don't rate (Em)
Just over(Am)compensate (Em)
At least (C)you'll know (G)you can always (D)go on Ricki Lake
(F) The world needs (G)wannabe's
(F) The world loves (G)wannabe's
(F) So let's get some more (G)wannabe's
(Am)Hey, hey do that brand new (Am-stop)thing! [end]
